dotnetType.name: UnionSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UnionSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new union serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds a union serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

returns.summary: Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UnionSchema" /> of one or more schemas.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary:
Always true; this case will apply but fail if the type cannot be mapped to at least one
            schema in the union.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.
The serializer builder to use to build child serializers.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnionSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
